item.title: WA-285 North Approaching US-2/US-97 Jct.
item.description: WA-285 North Approaching US-2/US-97 Jct. Use right lane for access to Alt. US-97 to Chelan and Entiat.

item.title: OR-201 South at US-95 Spur
item.description: OR-201 south at US-95 Spur north to Lewiston and Weiser (both communities in Idaho). Continue south on OR-201 for Payette (ID) and Ontario.

item.title: OR-201 South at US-95 Spur
item.description: OR-201 south approaching US-95 Spur, north.

item.title: End US-95 Spur at US-95
item.description: End US-95 Spur north at US-95 in Weiser.

item.title: US-95 Spur North at Olds Ferry Jct.
item.description: US-95 Spur north at Olds Ferry Jct. Turn right for Olds Ferry; continue north on US-95 Spur for Payette and Weiser. Entering Weiser, Idaho.

item.title: US-95 Spur North - Welcome To Idaho
item.description: Welcome To Idaho on US-95 Spur North. The Idaho welcome sign is on the Oregon side of the Snake River. The highway crosses the Snake River here into Weiser, Idaho.

item.title: US-95 Spur North - Leaving Oregon
item.description: Oregon Thanks You - Come Back Soon on US-95 Spur approaching the Snake River bridge into Idaho.

item.title: US-95 Spur - Annex
item.description: Entering the community of Annex, on US-95 Spur north. Annex is directly across the Snake River from Weiser, Idaho.

item.title: OR-201 North at US-95 Spur
item.description: OR-201 north at US-95 Spur north to Weiser, Idaho.

item.title: OR-201 North at US-95 Spur
item.description: OR-201 north at US-95 Spur. Use US-95 Spur north for Weiser and Lewiston (both in Idaho). Continue north on OR-201 for Baker City and Huntington. US-95 Spur connects OR-201 with US-95 across the Snake River in Idaho.

item.title: OR-201 North Approaching US-95 Spur
item.description: OR-201 North approaching US-95 Spur near Annex.

item.title: End US-95 Spur at Olds Ferry Jct.
item.description: US-95 Spur south at Olds Ferry Highway. US-95 Spur crosses the Snake River just south of here and enters Oregon. Sign reads End US-95 Spur - but it is still signed as US-95 Spur on the Oregon side of the Snake River.

item.title: US-95 Spur - Weiser
item.description: US-95 Spur south (State St.) to Payette at Main St. to Baker (Oregon).

item.title: US-95 South - Weiser Truck Routes
item.description: US-95 south at US-95 Spur. Oregon bound truck traffic use US-95 spur. South Idaho truck traffic, continue south on US-95.

item.title: US-95 North at US-95 Spur (Payette)
item.description: US-95 north at US-95 Spur junction. Merge right to continue north on US-95.

item.title: US-95 North Approaching US-95 Spur (Payette)
item.description: US-95 north approaching US-95 Spur in Payette.

item.title: US-95 North Approaching US-95 Spur (Payette)
item.description: US-95 north approaching US-95 spur in Payette. Turn right to continue north on US-95.

item.title: US-95 North Approaching US-95 Spur (Payette)
item.description: US-95 north approaching US-95 Spur in Payette.

item.title: End US-95 Spur South at OR-201
item.description: End US-95 Spur at OR-201 north to Baker and Portland; south to Nyssa and Ontario.

item.title: ID-52 East at US-95 Spur
item.description: ID-52 east at US-95 Spur to Fruitland and Winnemucca.

item.title: ID-52 East at US-95 Spur
item.description: ID-52 east approaching US-95 Spur.

item.title: OR-201 South at US-95 Spur
item.description: OR-201 south approaching US-95 Spur, north.

item.title: OR-201 South at US-95 Spur
item.description: OR-201 south at US-95 Spur north to Lewiston and Weiser.

item.title: US-95 Spur North - Distance Marker
item.description: US-95 Spur North to Lewiston and Weiser. US-95 Spur connects the Oregon side of the Snake River, with the Idaho side at Weiser.

item.title: OR-201 North at US-95 Spur
item.description: OR-201 North at US-95 Spur north to Weiser and Lewiston. US-95 spur connects OR-201, to Weiser about 5 miles north across the Snake River in Idaho.
